alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 8:03PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorms and heavy downpours will impact portions of southwestern Tolland and southeastern Hartford Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 803 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms and heavy downpours over Rocky Hill, or near Wethersfield, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Manchester, East Hartford, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Wethersfield, Farmington, Berlin, Rocky Hill, Tolland, Coventry, Hebron, Marlborough, Columbia, Bolton and Andover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
